content: Congrats to the Swift Student Challenge winners and the 50 brand new Distinguished Winners! From helping with speech accessibility to an all-in-one assistant for elderly people, these app projects show how young people are putting their mark on the world.
The work of a great teacher lasts a lifetime. Thank you to educators everywhere for your dedication and generosity.
Take note! I’m so excited for you to join us for today's #AppleEvent at 7am PT. Tune in here:

Meet the new iPad Pro: the thinnest product we’ve ever created, the most advanced display we’ve ever produced, with the incredible power of the M4 chip. Just imagine all the things it’ll be used to create.
Wishing all the incredible mothers at Apple and around the world a happy Mother’s Day! We are all better off because of your love, guidance, and compassion. 💐

For nearly 40 years, Apple has worked to make technology more accessible to everyone. We’re thrilled to announce powerful new features that provide users with even more ways to communicate, control their devices, and enjoy the music they love. #GAAD
An incredible story and an important advocate. Thank you for sharing your journey so that others may benefit.
We owe an enormous debt of gratitude to all those who made the ultimate sacrifice on behalf of our nation. On this Memorial Day, let us remember their heroism and the cause for which they fell.

An honor to welcome Blair Casey and Phil Green of TeamGleason to Apple Park. Thank you for your collaboration over the years, your tireless advocacy, and your commitment to supporting the ALS community through accessible technology. #ALSAwarenessMonth
Can’t wait for you to join us at #WWDC24 this morning!

It’s personal, powerful, and private—and it’s integrated into the apps you rely on every day.

Introducing Apple Intelligence—our next chapter in AI.
Thank you to all of the developers from around the world who joined us in person and virtually for an incredible #WWDC24! Can’t wait to see what amazing apps you create.
Wishing a happy Father’s Day to dads everywhere!
On this Juneteenth, let’s reaffirm our commitment to fairness and equity.

We’re thrilled to see our customers in mainland China, Hong Kong, Japan, and Singapore experience Apple Vision Pro for the first time! Pre-orders start today in Australia, Canada, France, Germany, & the UK. We can’t wait for customers there to see the magic of spatial computing.
Congratulations! We can’t wait to see what you create.
